caption:
This photograph presents a vivid and dramatic scene, blending elements of urban infrastructure and construction with historical architecture. In the foreground, there is a traffic light set against a pole, displaying a red signal that anchors the left side of the image. Positioned directly in the background and central in the composition is a tall tower that sports a traditional architectural style with a pyramidal roof atop a brick structure that includes a large clock face showing the time as 3:65, which is obviously a quirk or mistake in the image.

The environment around these two main elements appears to be a construction or demolition site, evident from the chaotic accumulation of debris and materials. Prominently visible is a piece of heavy machinery—possibly an excavator or backhoe—with its arm and bucket extended, surrounded by rubble, twisted metal, and other construction equipment partially visible. The scene suggests a significant transformation or clearing in progress, set in an urban setting indicated by the presence of a building with several floors in the far background right side of the image.

Overall, the photograph captures a juxtaposition of destruction and enduring structures, highlighted under a clear sky, suggesting transformation amidst stability in an urban landscape.
title: Environment is the theme of Expo '74, now under construction. This photo was taken one year before opening day.
